      • bind

        public static void bind(javafx.scene.control.ListView lv1,
                        javafx.scene.control.ListView lv2,
                        int bindType)
        Allows binding of 2 ListView's scrollbars.
        Parameters:
        lv1 - left list view
        lv2 - right list view
        bindType - 3 binding possibilities : BIND_BIDIRECTIONAL=bidirectional, BIND_RIGHT_TO_LEFT and BIND_LEFT_TO_RIGHT
